casebody.data:
Martin J. MURPHY, Plaintiff, Appellant, v. A/S SOBRAL et al., Defendants, Appellees. No. 5688. United States Court of Appeals First Circuit. Oct. 28, 1960. Nathan Greenberg, Boston, Mass., for appellant. Leo F. Glynn, Boston, Mass., for A/S Sobral, Inc., appellee. *393O. Davis, Jr., Tampa, Fla., of counsel, for appellant.

*392Before WOODBURY, Chief Judge, and HARTIGAN and ALDRICH, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment of the District Court is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Ford. 182 F.Supp. 636.
